CustomField.formula: IF( Colour_Flag__c = 'RED', IMAGE("/img/samples/color_red.gif", "red", 30, 30), IF(Colour_Flag__c = 'YELLOW', IMAGE("/img/samples/color_yellow.gif", "yellow", 30, 30), IF(Colour_Flag__c = 'GREEN', IMAGE("/img/samples/color_green.gif", "green", 30, 30), IMAGE("https://mcdn.wallpapersafari.com/medium/11/79/PaHE2U.jpg", "orange", 30, 30) ) ))
CustomField.label: Colour Revenue
